forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy. Low around 40, with temperatures rising to around 43 overnight. South southeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 1pm. Cloudy. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 7pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 35, with temperatures rising to around 37 overnight. West northwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 44. West northwest wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog before 4am, then areas of fog and patchy drizzle. Mostly cloudy. Low around 40, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. Southeast wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog and patchy drizzle before 10am, then areas of fog and scattered rain showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 52, with temperatures falling to around 46 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night

Northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: The Snow Crew had a chance to test the system today with a nice shot of cold air.
